sentences: Steven "Dobby" Dawson (born 24 February 1952) is an English bass guitarist and a founder of Saxon.

"It was only a few years ago that the penny dropped about Harry Shearer," he observed in 2014, "when he said he'd been on tour with Saxon and some of the character of Derek Smalls had been based on me â€“ pointing at the audience and all that malarkey.
